Event Gatekeeper: Have you heard? As of Chronicle 5, a brand new, affordable teleportation option is made available for the exclusive use of the Noblesse! In celebration of the dawn of a new era, we're offering everyone a chance to utilize this teleportation option normally reserved for the Noblesse. You are invited to *teleport to nearby hunting grounds for the same price charged to a Noblesse*. You should try it out! [npc_%objectId%_Chat 0|"I want to go to the hunting grounds."]
